Package com.quinsoft.zeidon.utils

Provides some utility classes for use by Zeidon applications.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PortableFileReader.PortableFileAttributeHandler  
    PortableFileReader.PortableFileEntityHandler  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BufferedBinaryStreamReader
    A buffered reader that can read strings or bytes from a stream.
    CacheMapImpl
    Implementation of CacheMap using Google Guava MapMaker.
    EventStackTrace
    Simple event listener that prints out a stack trace.
    IntegerLinkedHashMap<K>
    Convenience integer map that will default values to 0.
    JoeUtils
    A collection of static utility methods.
    KeyStringBuilder
    A class used to build consistent key strings.
    PortableFileReader
    Generic logic to read Zeidon Object Instances from a file or stream.
    PortableFileReader.PortableFileAttributeHandler.NullAttributeHandler
    An attribute handler that ignores all attributes.
    PortableFileReader.PortableFileEntityHandler.NullEntityHandler
    An entity handler that does nothing.
    QualificationBuilder
    A builder for creating and manipulating Qualification objects.
    QualificationBuilderFromJson
    Updates a QualifcationBuilder from a JSON string.
    RestServerImplementation
    Implements the activate and commit logic for REST servers.
    StringInterpolator
    Utility to perform string interpolation using Zeidon objects.
    Timer
    Used to measure elapsed time.
    WriteOisToJsonStreamNoIncrementals
    Serializes an OI by writing it as a JSON stream.
    ZeidonInputStream
    A forwarding wrapper of InputStream that includes a string describing the source of the input stream.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RestServerImplementation.DataFormat
    Lists the currently available data formats that can be used to transfer data between the client and the server.

Package com.quinsoft.zeidon.utils Description

Provides some utility classes for use by Zeidon applications.
